Antennal lobe (Manduca) principal neuron.Synonym: uniglomerular projection neuron,medial-antenno-protocerebral-tract projection neuron,inner-antennocerebral-tract projection neuron
Antennal lobe (Manduca) principal neuron.Definition: uniglomerular principal neuron in the antennal lobe of the tobacco hornworm moth, in neuronal cell groups on the border of the antennal lobe, mainly medial and anterior cell groups.  It likely uses acetylcholine as a transmitter.  The axon projects to lateral protocerebrum with collaterals in the mushroom body.
